tooltip.banner: This let's you change your Valorant card.
tooltip.activity: This let's you change your Valorant activity.
tooltip.availableActivity: Changes your activity to avaliable (removes custom status).
tooltip.onlineActivity: Changes your activity to online (display custom status).
tooltip.awayActivity: Changes your activity to away (removes custom status).
tooltip.streamActivity: Changes your activity to purple (glitch visuals).
tooltip.dndActivity: Changes your activity to Do Not Disturb (removes custom status).
tooltip.offlineActivity: Changes your activity to offline (hides you offline).
tooltip.title: Note: This value will only show for friends that are not in your party (this will NOT show on your client!).
tooltip.level: Note: This value will only show for friends that are not in your party (this will NOT show on your client!).
tooltip.systemMessage: This will send a system message in your party (client sided only).
tooltip.noRank: Use this to remove your rank from your profile completely.

account.title: Profile Title
account.leaderboardPlaceholder: Enter a number to be your position..

footer.text: Vulx Profile Editor - Made with ♡ by
